oai_dc:dc.dc:title: St. Paul Chapel Missionary Baptist Church: auxiliary building
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: St. Paul Chapel Missionary Baptist Church
St. Paul Chapel Missionary Baptist Church, near Richardson's Landing, Dummonds Road, St. Paul, Tipton Co., TN
Color photograph of yellow brick structure with gable roof and one-story porch; porch has two white columns and two white doors; two air conditioning units.

St. Paul Chapel Missionary Baptist Church is an early Reconstruction era black settlement along the Mississippi River. The late 20th century property has an adjacent Rosenwald School building and a historic cemetery that contains at least one grave of a U.S. Colored Troops veteran. The cemetery also contains examples of folk art grave markers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee; Church buildings -- Tennessee
